## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8b1bca17c15bf68fb9c8f7c556404e901df53fcd0b824284ae45de21525d2adb)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'strict-csp-builder' @ 100.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
